doc.field: New-York Historical Society Library Department records
New-York Historical Society Library Department records
Series VII. Board Library Committee Matters (RESTRICTED)
Series VII. Board Library Committee Matters (RESTRICTED)

The series includes Library management's copies of Board of Trustee meeting materials, principally those of the Library Committee. The series also holds the Library's work files and other underlying material prepared in support of Board and Board Committee deliberations. As of 2017, only Library Committee reports to 1959 are open for research. See the Access Restrictions note.
